songs.title: 24 Hours (Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: YG]
Girl, he got your money
Mustard on the beat, ho

[Verse 1: Bobby Shmurda]
Then I ask her what she waiting for, called my phone then
She told me that she 24, going grown
Then I ask her what she tripping for, I get my own
And my mama she don't live at home, I bought her Rome
Thick thigh little pretty ho
And I be getting high when she getting low
You should see her hips slide when she on the pole
So I'ma go and get miles 'fore I hit the dough
Girl, I got 24 hours
Girl, pop that, pop that
When I say start don't stop that, stop that
Let a hot nigga hit it
You gon' be addicted when a hot nigga get it, huh

[Bridge: TeeFLii]
Girl, don't hide it from me
You should be the type to provide it to me (To me)
And let a thug hit it (This is the remix)
You ain't gotta get dressed or do your hair

[Chorus: TeeFLii]
Girl, I got 24 hours, 24 hours
It's just me and you, I got 24 hours
24 hours, 24 hours
You won't have nothing on for 24 hours

[Verse 2: Ty Dolla Sign]
Yeah
Girl by the way (By the way)
I been drinking Bombay (Bombay)
And I ain't come to talk (Come to talk)
I was thinking rough sex hit it out the ballpark
One shot, two shot (Two shot)
Got your little ass too drunk (Too drunk)
Oh, big booty on her (Booty on her)
Told her back that ass up like Juve on it
Oh yeah, twerk it for a real one (Real one)
Is it me, or my nigga? Girl, choose one (Choose one)
I'm with all my niggas and we all rich (And we all rich)
Girl I'm a boss and I need a boss bitch (Oh)
I got two more hours (Hours)
And I'ma give you dick, no flowers (No flowers)
Dolla $ign girl get it tatted (Tatted)
I like it when you call me "Big Daddy"

[Chorus: TeeFLii]
Girl, I got 24 hours, 24 hours
It's just me and you, I got 24 hours
24 hours, 24 hours
You won't have nothing on for 24 hours

[Verse 3: TeeFLii]
Walking around, combing your hair
And you know that I want it right here, yeah, yeah!
Catch you out, you bring me up
Yeah, yeah you want my touch
You know you fine (You fine)
Got long hair and don't care
I know everywhere you take
Fuck then get some sleep
Wake up and do it again
Girl, don't hide it from me
You should be the type to provide it to me (To me)
A little tuck, get it
You ain't gotta get dressed and do your hair

[Chorus: TeeFLii]
Girl, I got 24 hours, 24 hours
It's just me and you, I got 24 hours
24 hours, 24 hours
You won't have nothing on for 24 hours
